query.name: orderCodeList
query.description: 要创建交接单的小包编码集合数量上限300

query.name: client
query.description: ISV名称ISV：ISV-ISV英文或拼音名称、商家ERP：SELLER-商家英文或拼音名称

query.name: orderCode
query.description: 大包单号即大包LP号orderCode、trackingNumber二者选其一

query.name: trackingNumber
query.description: 大包运单号orderCode、trackingNumber二者选其一

query.name: weightUnit
query.description: 重量单位克:g, 千克:kg默认g

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/cnpms/bigbag/update')
request.add_api_parameter("userInfo", "{\"appUserKey\":\"12345\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("weight", "100")
request.add_api_parameter("locale", "zh_CN")
request.add_api_parameter("orderCodeList", "[\"LZD1001\",\"LZD1002\",\"LZD1003\"]")
request.add_api_parameter("client", "test")
request.add_api_parameter("orderCode", "LP000000123")
request.add_api_parameter("trackingNumber", "ST0000123")
request.add_api_parameter("weightUnit", "g")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/cnpms/bigbag/update')
request.add_api_param('userInfo', '{\"appUserKey\":\"12345\"}')
request.add_api_param('weight', '100')
request.add_api_param('locale', 'zh_CN')
request.add_api_param('orderCodeList', '[\"LZD1001\",\"LZD1002\",\"LZD1003\"]')
request.add_api_param('client', 'test')
request.add_api_param('orderCode', 'LP000000123')
request.add_api_param('trackingNumber', 'ST0000123')
request.add_api_param('weightUnit', 'g')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.message: handover content status not committed、awaiting_tracking_number or awaiting_pickup, can not update
error_codes.description: 大包状态非已提交、等待分配运单号、待揽收不能更新该大包
选择的所有小包都找不到请核对后重试

error_codes.message: query across store account not found
error_codes.description: 跨店铺组包账号不存在
